TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MethodAccessException extends System.MemberAccessException

summary.span: 无效地尝试访问方法时（例如从部分信任的代码访问私有方法）引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when there is an invalid attempt to access a method, such as accessing a private method from partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此异常未包含在[.NET for Windows Store 应用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)，但它将引发的某些成员。This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), but it is thrown by some members that are. 若要在这种情况下捕获异常，编写`catch`语句相反。To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for instead. 在如下所示的情况下，将引发此异常：This exception is thrown in situations such as the following: - 通过使用反射情况下，从部分受信任代码访问私有、 受保护或内部的方法，则不能从正常编译的代码访问。A private, protected, or internal method that would not be accessible from normal compiled code is accessed from partially trusted code by using reflection. - 从透明代码访问安全关键方法。A security-critical method is accessed from transparent code. - 类库中的方法的访问级别已更改，且具有未重新编译引用该库的一个或多个程序集。The access level of a method in a class library has changed, and one or more assemblies that reference the library have not been recompiled. > [!NOTE] > 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，公共语言运行时将应用程序代码视为透明使用部分信任运行时。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the common language runtime treats application code as transparent when it is run with partial trust. 请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). 使用 HRESULT COR_E_METHODACCESS，具有 0x80131510 的值。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_METHODACCESS, that has the value 0x80131510. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将新实例的 属性设置为系统提供的描述错误的消息，如“试图访问该方法时失败”。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempt to access the method failed."

summary.span: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

span.span: This message takes into account the current system culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容`message`应是可以理解的用户。The content of `message` should be understandable to the user. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常可以在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|
